summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 18803, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue South, from the north lien of Stevens Street to a connection with the existing sewer in Bay View Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, with all wyes, opening, flush tanks, manholes, lampholes, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1392 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle", approved July 17, 1908.
